name: Gdevelop5 - pseudo 3D dungeon crawler
description:
This is pseudo 3D grid-based dungeon crawler I made in Gdevelop5 some time ago.  It is very early and incomplete demo, but you can try basic features... Im not sure sure about fate of this project but somebody might find it interesting...

Controls: 

movement -wasd

turn - qe

interact - space

attack - v

block - b
